imdb.title: Sayonara zetsubô sensei
imdb.plot: A pessimistic high school teacher must somehow manage a class of eccentric students.

episodes.title: Sayonara zetsubô sensei
episodes.plot: Nozomu tries to hang himself, but is prevented from doing so by an overbearingly cheerful young girl named Kafuka. He tries to escape from her, but learns she is his student.

episodes.title: Tonneru wo nukeru to shirokatta
episodes.plot: Nozomu tries to get the reclusive Kiri Kimori out of her house. Later, he tries to stop the stalker Matoi Tsunetsuki from bothering her new boyfriend.

episodes.title: Sono kuni wo tobi koshite koi
episodes.plot: A new student, foreigner Kaere Kimura, arrives in class and immediately starts harassing Nozomu. Meanwhile, Miss Arai discovers an illegal immigrant, Maria Taro Sekiutsu.

episodes.title: Hiji ni mo makezu hiza ni mo makezu
episodes.plot: Nozomu investigates why Abiru Kobushi is always bandaged and injured. He later deals with Meru Otonashi, a mute girl who communicates through e-mail.

episodes.title: Mi no take kurabe/Shimi to dokudashi
episodes.plot: Nozomu tries to judge the social worth of his students, but ends up going on a wasteful binge before another suicide attempt. Later, he visits a hot spring and discovers it can make the girls normal.

episodes.title: Miau mae ni tobe
episodes.plot: Nozomu heads to his hometown for an arranged marriage ceremony. The girls rush there, each having in mind becoming Nozomu's wife.

episodes.title: Kamei no kokuhaku/Aru asa gurebôru zamuza ga me wo samasu to mikoshi wo katsuide ita
episodes.plot: Harumi explains to Nozomu about her writing. Later, everyone attends a matsuri festival and it gets out of control.

episodes.title: Watashi wa shukumei teki ni hikage mono de aru
episodes.plot: Kagero Usui never gets any attention.

episodes.title: Fuji ni tsukimisô wa machigatte iru
episodes.plot: Nozomu instructs his students to find mistakes in their lives, but Kafuka points out that some mistakes made were correct. He later meets his nephew Majiru.

episodes.title: Hitori no bunkajin ga rashômon no shita de ama yadori shiteita/Namayasuhashi wo yakaneba naranu
episodes.plot: Nozomu decides to stay out of a cultural festival, believing it's not fit for good people. Later, he tales Class 2-He on a field trip.

episodes.title: Are fuka yo gensaku ga aru janaikane
episodes.plot: The girls watch a bad film, and discover the director avoiding responsibility. Later, Nozomu tries hibernation but it goes wrong and he ends up getting hit by a tram.

episodes.title: Nantaru meiwaku de aru koto ka!
episodes.plot: Nozomu must deal with Ai Kaga, a girl who keeps taking blame for others' crimes, and Mayo Mitama, a mean girl who always gets away with her deeds.
